languages.text: "Ладно, давай по-твоему. Равор, передай друкари согласие на переговоры".

traits.locale_text: "Ладно, давай по твоему. Равор, передай друкари согласие на переговоры".

languages.text: "Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."
languages.original_text: "Ладно, давай по-твоему. Равор, передай друкари согласие на переговоры".

traits.locale_text: "Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."

"Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."
"Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."

languages.text: "Schön, wie Ihr wollt. Ravor, sagt den Drukhari, dass wir Verhandlungen zustimmen."
languages.original_text: "Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."

traits.locale_text: "Schön, wie Ihr wollt. Ravor, sagt den Drukhari, dass wir Verhandlungen zustimmen."

languages.text: “好吧，按你说的来。雷沃，告诉那群黑暗灵族，我们同意谈判。”
languages.original_text: "Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，按你说的来。雷沃，告诉那群黑暗灵族，我们同意谈判。”

languages.text: « Très bien, comme vous voudrez. Ravor, dites aux Drukharis que nous acceptons d'engager des pourparlers. »
languages.original_text: "Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien, comme vous voudrez. Ravor, dites aux Drukharis que nous acceptons d'engager des pourparlers. »

languages.text: «De acuerdo, como quieras. Ravor, informe a los Drukhari de que aceptamos parlamentar».
languages.original_text: "Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo, como quieras. Ravor, informe a los Drukhari de que aceptamos parlamentar».

languages.text: 「わかった、お前のしたいようにすればいい。ラヴォア、デュカーリに交渉すると伝えてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."

traits.locale_text: 「わかった、お前のしたいようにすればいい。ラヴォア、デュカーリに交渉すると伝えてくれ」

languages.text: "Peki, sen bilirsin. Ravor, Drukharilere görüşme yapmayı kabul ettiğimizi ilet."
languages.original_text: "Fine, have it your way. Ravor, tell the Drukhari that we agree to parley."

traits.locale_text: "Peki, sen bilirsin. Ravor, Drukharilere görüşme yapmayı kabul ettiğimizi ilet."
